General.Name: IHS Holding Ltd
General.Description: IHS Holding Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and operates shared communications infrastructure in Nigeria, Sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and North Africa, and Latin America. It offers colocation and lease agreement, build-to-suit, in-building, small cell, fiber connectivity, and rural telephony solutions to mobile network operators, internet service providers, security functions, and private corporations. IHS Holding Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Cathedral Piazza, London, United Kingdom, SW1E 5BP
